- Use ville_recherche as fallback when ville is missing
- Extract to temp directories to avoid overwriting local JSON
- Clean up temp files after import
- Show detailed import stats (JSON + Artifacts counts)
- Replace deprecated st.experimental_rerun() with st.rerun()
